transcript:
Customer: Hey, kapde hello. Hello.
Executive: Hi sir, Pallavi baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Ji aapki baat ho sakti hai sir aapne.
Customer: Haan boliye boliye.
Executive: Haan sir, EK Industries ke liye maine call kiya tha. To sir ji sir jo buyleads aapne bheji thi na usme ek buylead maine check karai thi. To usme sir rukiye main aapko bata deti hu basically isme kya hai. Ki ek minute rukiye mere paas revert bhi aaya hai. Just a minute.

Customer: Daily basis pe. Sir buyer ne yahi haan ji haan ji bataiye sir.
Executive: Daily basis pe mujhe aaj bhi kuch leads mila hai aisa ki jinka requirement hi nahi tha. Wo bhi main abhi share kar raha hu hai na aapke sath.
Customer: Ji. Please thoda share kar dijiye. Haan. Sir kuch buylead aise bhi to honge na jahan pe buyer response kar rahe honge properly.
Customer: Nahi madam ji kyuki dekho mujhe 10 mera paanch leads milta hai mujhe maan lijiye. Usme se ek lead bhi mujhe mere favor ki nikli na to bhi koi issue nahi hai. Ya fir mutton ko chahiye but rate me hamara nahi jam raha hai wo bhi mujhe chalega no issue madam.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Mera kehne ka matlab kya hai ki chalo theek hai usko material mil chahiye lekin rate usko nahi pahunch raha hai ya fir koi price ke beech me issues hai ya fir payment terms hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Aisa bhi hai to bhi mujhe koi issue nahi hai but ek bhi lead mujhe meri iske nahi mil rahi hai na aur aaj tak che saat mahine me ek bhi lead jo hai wo business ke isme convert nahi hue hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: And mera kehne ka matlab wahi hai ki aadmi frustrated ho jata hai na matlab dekhiye main khud call kar leta hu. Hmm. Maine call kar leta hu customer seedha ye to wo bolta hai kya hai kaunsi lead kaunsa IndiaMART. Matlab itni itni ghatiya ye aa chuke hai matlab ye.
Executive: Ab main sir aapko ek baat batau ek buylead maine check karwai thi jo offer ID 1333298 wala aapne jo share kiya tha. Usme buyer ne yahi bataya hai team ne yahan se thoda check kiya buyer se cross verify kiya. To wo bechna hi chah rahe the product ko. To unhone yahi bataya ki unko aisa buyer hi unhone act kiya tha aur wo apna product sell hi karna chah rahe the. To wahi hai na ki ab kisi ka intention sir aise clear bhi nahi ho payenge. To yahi hai unse main wahi bol rahi thi team aise approve nahi karegi buylead unless buyer apne side se act na kare waise to team apne side se aise approve nahi karti hai sir buylead me.
Customer: Sir theek hai ye to ho gaya apna buyer ko sell karna hai material theek hai. Ji ji. Lekin usme ye bhi hai ki kuch customers aise hai ki buyer sell karna chahte hai but 90% jo leads aati hai usme se matlab unko chahiye hi nahi hota ye product.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Aise bhi kuch hai. Chalo theek hai maine bola ki buyer ko LED chahiye main uska number save kar lega mere team me meri team se agar ek baar interaction karke chalo theek hai koi baat nahi abhi aapke paas material hai hum bhi isi me deal karte hai in future kabhi aapko lagega to please connect with us ye bhi hum karte hai madam. Hmm.
Ye bhi kar sakte hai. Chalo uske alawa aur kya lekin 90% jo leads hai na wo hoti hai ki nahi hai sir kya cheez hai kya nahi hai aur mujhe lagta hai local bhi lead immediately put up kyu ho jati hai jaise ki GST verify nahi hai ya fir customer ka hai koi aisa hai ki banda message kar raha bolta hai humko pata hi nahi kisne de diya hai multiple calls receive nahi karte wo to kaise chalo chod dijiye kyuki jab tak main communicate na karu tab tak main kaise bol sakta hu aapko ki ye lead hai ya nahi hai. Nahi nahi.
Customer: Dekho aaj maine teen leads consume kiya hai sabko call maine personally kiye the kyuki aaj main just aaj pe tha aaj to ghar baith ke maine jab calls kiye hai unka bhi same scenario hai madam. Hmm hmm. Ek ka hi response nahi hai do teen hai aur usme kya ho raha hai ki hum kya soch rahe the ki chalo mera IndiaMART ke sath judne ka ek hi reason tha payment bhi aapko de diya hai wo to free me the waisa hi same issues hai aisa lag raha hai. Package leke kya fayda hai na madam. Sir lekin main aapko ek baat se aaj ki buylead. Ji ji boliye. Haan.
Executive: Haan sir main ye bol rahi thi ki maine abhi buyleads aapki check ki jo aapne aaj consume kiye hai. To dekhiye problem wahi aa raha hai na ki buyleads purani bhi consume aap kar rahe hai. Sir koshish yahi kariye na ki naye consume kare fresh buylead pe sir response better milega aapko. Ab dekhiye 20 tarikh ko aaj jo buylead purchase ki hai ek to hai 18 November ki do hai 19 November ki. Problem ye dekhiye jo cheez apne side se sahi ho sakte hai to wo to hum kar sakte hai na. Nahi nahi nahi nahi aapki baat nahi nahi aapki baat barabar hai theek hai. Haan ji. Agar maan lo ki 19 tarikh ka matlab kal ka maine ek buylead consume kar liya. Hmm. Haan. Koi baat nahi usne yahi bolna chahiye ki sir mera requirement fulfill ho chuka hai. Hmm. Ya fir mujhe ye product abhi nahi hai mera requirement fulfill hai maine kiya tha next to hum mera customer ke contact list me daal jayega na ye. Hmm hmm hmm. Ki chalo mera excel me uska ek number aayega ye bhi buyers hai unko future me hamari backend team meri sales ki touch me rahenge. Hmm. Hmm.
Lekin banda bol raha hai ki mujhe chahiye hi nahi ye kya hota hai to dikkate hai aur waisi lead main aapke sath share kar raha hu. Hmm hmm. Aisa nahi hai main aisa nahi. Sir try kariye sir dekhiye lekin jo cheez apne side se correct ho sakte hai sir wo to hum kar sakte hai na. Aap koshish yahi kariye sir ki fresh buylead aap purchase kare. To usme to kyuki dekhiye ab main bhi wahi cheez aapko bolungi. Fresh karke kya fayda hai agar wo buylead hi kaam ki nahi hai maan lijiye. Sir buyer dekhiye sir agar requirement puri ho gayi kisi ke paas aaj kal itna time nahi hai ki har cheez update kare main aapka point galat nahi prove kar rahi hu aapke point valid hai. Lekin sir jo cheez sahi ho sakti hai sir wo to hum kar sakte hai na ab dekhiye jaise meri requirement hai abhi ki maine abhi ke abhi requirement post ki aur aapne buylead purchase kar li aur baat ho gayi buyer se sir agar tab bhi kuch problem hai tab ek baar dekhte hai ki ha isme abhi bhi wahi problem aa raha hai. Chalo ye bhi karke dekh lete hai. Ek baar ek baar sir try kariye ki nahi ek baar nahi mam aapki aapke iske liye main ek nahi char baar aur karenge koi issue nahi usme dekhte hai ki ye resolve hota hai ya nahi. Ji ji ji. Sir ek baar dekhiye. Ji ji. Result aata hai to fir aap mujhe bataiye ek baar hai na. Main abhi aapke sath share kar lunga aapke sath ji. Immediate main aapko wo jo inka number hai mere paas whatsapp pe main share karunga. Akanksha ka hoga Akanksha ko aap bhej dijiyega sir same. Nahi Akanksha ji ko hi main share karta hu abhi subah bhi ek screenshot bheja hai. Chahiye to aap maang lijiye unse. Nahi nahi wo mere se connect hai sir meri team me hi hai Akanksha to wo mere ko de dengi detail sari to aap jo bhi issue hota hai na ek baar unko aap whatsapp kar dijiyega. Ji ji ji mam ji mam. Okay sir okay thank you sir thank you have a nice day.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting quality buyleads.

- Most leads do not match requirements.

- Frustrated with the lack of business conversion.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the buyleads consumed by customer.

- Executive suggested to consume fresh buyleads.

- Executive agreed to check the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check if the issue resolves or not.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, quality, resolution
